column1: Wasatch Trails Collective would not be what it is without our community made up of diverse backgrounds and experiences. As a running (and many other sports/recreational interests) group, we know how much of a privilege it is to be able to move & recreate freely and without fear. Our community remains dedicated to supporting one another until all the walls from Palestine to Mexico are torn down. Support local & support those who are in solidarty with our community!! ‚ù§Ô∏è‚Äçüî•

Supporting businesses (whether closed for part of or the whole day; offering up space and resources; donating a portion or all of proceeds; showing solidarity, etc.) compiled from Utah Small Business Strike Coalition & social media posts.
